metadata.title: CVE-2021-47279 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: misc: brcmstb-usb-pinmap: check return value after callingplatform_get_resource()It will cause null-ptr-deref if platform_get_resource() returns NULL,we need check the return value.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
